name: Edgar the Explorer
body:
We dreamed of a FOSS (Free/Libre and Open Source) platformer on iOS. We didn't find any, so we ended up making it. Feedback, reuse and contributions are welcome!

### CC-BY 4.0 images
* [Level objects](https://github.com/PolipGames/Edgar/tree/master/Maze%20Escape/Level_objects_img)
* [User interface](https://github.com/PolipGames/Edgar/tree/master/Maze%20Escape/UI_img)
* Texture atlases: [main character walking](https://github.com/PolipGames/Edgar/tree/master/Maze%20Escape/edgar.atlas), [main character jumping](https://github.com/PolipGames/Edgar/tree/master/Maze%20Escape/edgarsaute.atlas), [monster](https://github.com/PolipGames/Edgar/tree/master/Maze%20Escape/monstre.atlas)

### LGPL code
* [Readme about code with links to classes](https://github.com/PolipGames/Edgar/tree/master/Maze%20Escape/README.md)
* [Classes folder](https://github.com/PolipGames/Edgar/tree/master/Maze%20Escape)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
